screens.label: Run
screens.click: this.event.send({name:'close-sheet'}); this.data.status = ''; this.data.next_run_date = new Date(); this.event.send({name: 'save'});

screens.label: New Action
screens.click: this.event.send({name:'close-sheet'}); this.event.send({name:'open-dialog', uiElementId: '200000000000000000000102', data: {task_id: this.data._id}, option: {width: '100vw', height: '100vh', panelClass: 'full-width-dialog'} });
